Key Match Events: Deniz Undav scored twice in the first half to give Germany a commanding lead.
Edin Dzeko reduced the deficit for Bosnia-Herzegovina in the 70th minute.
Germany held on to secure a 2-1 victory despite late pressure from Bosnia-Herzegovina.
Post-Match Reflections: Deniz Undav was named man of the match for his impressive performance.
Germany secured seven points from three games in League A Group 3.
Die Mannschaft are now two points clear at the top of the group.
Bosnia-Herzegovina dropped to fourth place in the group standings.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Deniz Undav scored twice in quick succession, first at 30th minute and then at 35th minute.
Bosnia-Herzegovina's Edin Dzeko cut the deficit in half with a header in the 70th minute.
The match ended with Germany holding a 2-1 lead over Bosnia-Herzegovina.
